column2: so be prepared to wait. The cool thing is that you can order your pizza before you're seated
column3: so the pizza doesn't take too long once you get a table. The pizza itself is legendary and needs no introduction. The service staff are competent and nice
column4: and my experience has been very consistent from visit to visit. So
column6: still a 5 all day. It's one of those rare places beloved by locals and tourists alike.
